data.name: Innocence Or Money - V 0.0.3
data.detailed_description:
Innocence Or Money V 0.0.3 is about the story of Jennifer, who is an innocent girl from a little town named Greensdale, she has lived all her life there with her sister Jessica and her uncle. She also has a boyfriend, Mike. One of her dreams is to go to the big city so she will pack everything and take the journey of her life!

Visual Novel with Sandbox Elements



She will rent a room and start cleaning to earn money, from that moment she will find ways to make more money by finding new jobs in the city and maybe by making some decisions that well... let's say that they are not morally correct. You will be able to select what she has to do in certain situations. Will you make the morally correct decision or you will corrupt her to the bone and see how deep the rabbit hole goes?... It will depend on your choices.

New Characters and Places:

Usually in each update more characters or more places are added, each character has their own story and background, and the new places become accesible to the player in the city map!

V 0.0.3 Include an in-game music player and sounds:

This update includes an in-game build music player. You will be able to select, stop, skip songs and also you can turn up or down the volume. There are also sounds added to the game to make it more inmersive.



  • Visual Novel + Sandbox elements
  • Female Protagonist
  • Music and Sounds: V 0.0.3 includes a music player and sounds to the game
  • Full HD 1080p images
  • Full HD smooth animations
  • Uncensored Hot Scenes
  • Replay Gallery included
  • Interesting story and characters
  • Corruption / Blackmailing / Cheating and everything around those beautiful topics :)
  • And much more!

Is Jennifer's future safe in your hands? You will decide if she prefers... Innocence Or Money



* IoM is a work in progress, in each update more content / characters / scenes will be added to the game *

data.short_description: Innocence Or Money V 0.0.3 Free Steam Version is the first Steam update of IoM. It's a mix of a Visual Novel/Sandbox game, where you be able to choose where to go and take decisions for the female MC Jennifer. Will you corrupt her and everything that surrounds her? Her destiny will be in your hands!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Superior
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Version 10.11 or Superior
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 4 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
The game includes sex between consenting adult characters, topics such as corruption, cheating, blackmailing and use of drugs and violence.

The main plot is based on the corruption of the female main protagonist.
